Title: Eco
Presenters: Bury Me and Plant a Tree
All Day Event: 'Until we discover the secret of immortality- we are all going to die one day- and it's healthy to talk and think about it!  Did you know there are more options than cremation and burial?  Join Merilynne Rush of After Death Home Care to learn about natural death care and what you need to know if you want to be composted rather than have a typical funeral.  It's not hard to do but it's not likely to happen unless you plan ahead.'

Title: Life
All Day Event: 'Join Merilynne Rush (Natural Death Care educator and founder of the Ann Arbor Death Cafe) for eating cake- drinking tea- and talking about death. The aim of this discussion is to help people make the most of their (finite) lives by increasing awareness. Participants will direct the conversation.'
